name: Neon Man
summary:
This will be a wonderful experience!
This is a very dynamic and addictive Game!
Swipe fingers to jump the floors and slide forward!!
Avoid Rotating-Obstacles!
Acquire Items (the Stars, Shields, Lightnings and Batteries) to survive!
Charge the Battery of the Neon Man to increase the speed!
A scary Circular-Saw chases the Neon Man.
Neon Man must escape away from the scary Circular-Saw!
